title: Diabetes Management Plan
description: Comprehensive treatment plan for Type 2 diabetes management and lifestyle modification

milestones.title: Initial HbA1c Assessment
milestones.description: Baseline HbA1c measurement and comprehensive metabolic panel

milestones.title: Medication Adjustment
milestones.description: Adjust Metformin dosage based on initial lab results
milestones.notes: Increased Metformin to 1000mg twice daily, patient tolerating well

milestones.title: Nutritionist Consultation
milestones.description: Meet with certified diabetes educator for meal planning

milestones.title: 3-Month Follow-up Labs
milestones.description: HbA1c, lipid panel, and kidney function assessment

title: Asthma Control Plan
description: Comprehensive asthma management and trigger identification program

milestones.title: Peak Flow Baseline
milestones.notes: Peak flow: 420 L/min, mild obstruction noted

milestones.title: Inhaler Technique Review
milestones.description: Review and optimize inhaler technique with respiratory therapist
milestones.notes: Technique improved, patient demonstrated proper use

milestones.title: Allergy Testing
milestones.description: Comprehensive allergy panel to identify triggers

title: Cardiac Recovery Plan
description: Post-cardiac event rehabilitation and monitoring program

milestones.title: Lipid Management Review
milestones.description: Assess cholesterol levels and medication effectiveness
